Detailed Description

The class create thread and start code in this thread.

Declaration:

 class InOtherThread : public mt::Thread {
   void run() {
     //This code will work on other thread.
   }
 };

Usage: 

 InOtherThread thread;
 thread.start(); //Create and start thread.
 thread.stop(); //Stop thread.

void mt::Thread::start (  )  [virtual]

Create and start thread.

Exceptions:
mt::ThreadAlreadyRunningException if the thread already started.
mt::ThreadTooManyThreadsException if threads limit was reached.
mt::ThreadInvalidArgumentException if some of given arguments are invalid.
mt::ThreadNoMemoryException if no memory.
mt::ThreadCantStartException if other errors was occurred.

Reimplemented in mt::InfiniteThread.
